title: Under Armour 's total workforce worldwide from 2009 to 2019
summary: As of 2019 , the Chinese internet company , headquartered in Shenzhen , had 16400 employees , most of whom were based in the Special Economic Zone of Shenzhen .
The tech giant earned over 50 billion yuan from its value-added services .
gold: Under Armour is an American sporting goods manufacturer , based in Baltimore , Maryland.
In 2019 , Under Armour employed about 16,400 people around the world.
Under Armour is one of the largest sportswear and sporting goods manufacturers in the world , however it is still far behind Nike and adidas who are the dominating companies within this industry .
